import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import AuthContext from '../../context/AuthContext'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated, isAdmin } = useContext(AuthContext); const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

Secure Blockchain Voting Platform

A transparent, secure, and decentralized electronic voting system built on blockchain technology.

{!isAuthenticated && ( )}
Secure Authentication Connect securely with your blockchain wallet. Your identity is verified using cryptographic proof, ensuring that only eligible voters can participate in elections.
Transparent Voting All votes are recorded on the blockchain, creating an immutable record that cannot be altered. Every vote is counted accurately, and the integrity of the election is preserved.
Anonymous Ballots Your vote remains anonymous. While the blockchain records that you have voted, it does not reveal your specific choices, protecting your privacy. Participate in Elections Browse current and upcoming elections, review candidate information, and cast your vote securely using blockchain technology. {isAdmin ? 'Manage Elections' : 'Election Results'} {isAdmin ? 'Create new elections, manage candidates, monitor voting activity, and finalize election results.' : 'View verified election results that are cryptographically secured by the blockchain.'} How It Works
1
Connect Wallet

Authenticate with your blockchain wallet

2
Register

Verify your eligibility to vote

3
Cast Your Vote

Select your candidate and sign the transaction

4
Verify

Confirm your vote on the blockchain

 ); }; export default Home;
